text: “Gumazamiziba ghaze: ‘Fomɨra Ikiavɨra Itir God Israelia ko Judaba me amɨsevezɨ, me a baghavɨra ikɨzir pumuningɨn iti. Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn an akɨrim ragha me gasaragha gɨfa.’ Gumazamizir kaba akar kamagh garibav gɨa, egha me nan gumazamizibagh ifongezir puvatɨgha, ghaze, men ganganimɨn, nan gumazamizibar kantri ovegha gɨfa.
